abstrac: Programming to the core for your website, mobile app & software
bio: We are a team of talented designers & developers who have tons of experience in development of websites, web applications, mobile apps etc. We have successfully delivered projects using LAMP, .NET, AJAX, JavaScript/j-Query, Web Services and many other cutting edge technologies...

Our motto is to Keep Things Simple.We let you decide between our wide range of delivery engagement models that suits you the best. You can opt for any of the following - 1. Dedicated Hire - Resources hired for you will be dedicatedly working on your projects & you will be billed on a monthly basis. You need to hire one or multiple resource(s) for a minimum of one month (176 billable hours) to engage this model. 2. Per Hour Billing - More suited for small tasks which do not require longer commitments.3. Fixed Project Price - We give you a fixed price for the complete project from start till implementation to your preferred hosting server.

bio:
Sales Force Automation Project for a division of a Fortune 100 Chemical Manufacturer.  The SFA systems encompassed eleven Oracle schemas, one with over 400 tables and over 17 gigabytes of data, reporting systems using Business Objects against three primary data marts, client side software with offline capabilities for over 450 sales representatives nationwide and multiple web sites.

Over $2.5 billion in sales ran through the SFA systems annualy from EDI incomming data validation and consolidation to customer rebates of over $130 million annually and commissions of over $16 million annually.

During my four years working with this client, I performed duties of Visual Basic Programmer for Data Entry Forms, Vendor Management for client software, Data Architecture design for multiple initiatives, Data Migration Management for implementation of new systems, Team Leader for the SFA 3.0 project which added an additional 200 users and three primary market users to the client software, Pro

bio:
I research, write, edit, and rewrite text for authenticity, correctness, grammar, and punctuation. I have a degree in psychology and am a Certified Personal Life Coach and a Certified Food Psychology Coach. I am experienced in APA format and Chicago styles. I am a published author of a cook book (1995) and have ghost-written published books and e-books. I have a significant medical background in pulmonary physiology and orthopedics. I am a PADI First Responder Instructor and Rescue Diver Instructor. Additionally, my areas of expertise include the psychology of eating and food as it relates to weight loss, food issues, and general fitness, health, and well-being. 
I have experience in the following areas:
Content writing
Preparation of manuscripts for publication (APA and Chicago Styles)
Teaching and mentoring novice writers; ghostwriting
Copy editing and rewrite/editing articles and book manuscripts for publication
Transcribing and composing reports from audio notes
